INSERT INTO HOUSE VALUES (HOUSE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{houseTitle}, #{houseCity}, #{houseAddress}, #{houseDescription}, #{housePhoto1}, #{housePhoto2}, #{housePhoto3}, #{housePhoto4}, -1, '', #{writer}, #{roomTitle}, #{roomCapa}, #{housePrice}, #{houseBarbecue}, #{houseBarbecuePrice}, #{houseParty}, #{housePartyPrice}, #{houseLNG}, #{houseLAT})
SELECT MAX(HOUSE_NO) FROM HOUSE
mapper.select: SELECT HOUSE_NO as houseNo, HOUSE_TITLE as houseTitle, HOUSE_CITY as houseCity, HOUSE_PHOTO1 as housePhoto1, HOUSE_SCORE as houseScore, ROOM_TITLE as roomTitle, ROOM_CAPA as roomCapa, HOUSE_PRICE as housePrice HOUSE_BARBECUE as houseBarbecue HOUSE_PARTY as houseParty, HOUSE_LNG as houseLng, HOUSE_LAT as houseLat FROM HOUSE WHERE HOUSE_STATUS = 1 ORDER BY HOUSE_ADDRESS
SELECT HOUSE_NO as houseNo, HOUSE_LAT as houseLat, HOUSE_LNG as houseLng FROM HOUSE WHERE HOUSE_STATUS = 1

SELECT R.HOUSE_NO, HOUSE_PHOTO1, H.HOUSE_TITLE, H.HOUSE_PRICE, H.ROOM_CAPA, NVL(HOUSE_BARBECUE_PRICE,0) AS HOUSE_BARBECUE_PRICE, NVL(HOUSE_PARTY_PRICE,0) AS HOUSE_PARTY_PRICE FROM ROOM R LEFT JOIN HOUSE H ON R.HOUSE_NO = H.HOUSE_NO WHERE ROOM_ENABLE = 1 AND H.ROOM_CAPA>#{roomCapa}
AND HOUSE_BARBECUE = 1 AND HOUSE_BARBECUE = 0
AND HOUSE_PARTY = 1 AND HOUSE_PARTY = 0
AND ROOM_NO NOT IN (SELECT R.ROOM_NO FROM ROOM R LEFT JOIN HOUSE H ON R.HOUSE_NO = H.HOUSE_NO LEFT JOIN ROOM_BOOK B ON R.ROOM_NO = B.ROOM_NO WHERE #{bookStartDate} BETWEEN BOOK_START_DATE AND BOOK_END_DATE OR #{bookEndDate} BETWEEN BOOK_START_DATE AND BOOK_END_DATE) ORDER BY HOUSE_NO ASC
